p: François Dabis, Joanna Orne‐Gliemann and Delphine Perriat conceived and designed the study. Laura Balzer, Shahin Lockman, Delphine Perriat, Kalpana Sabapathy and Fiona Walsh organized and conducted the data collection. Delphine Perriat wrote the first draft of the manuscript and also produced the figures and the tables. All authors analysed the data, contributed to the writing (and editing) of the manuscript, read and met the criteria for authorship and agreed with manuscript results and conclusions.
